DataElement.preferredName: Patient Communication Medical Record Review Consent Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown indicator related to permission by person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment for the exchange of information and review of their medical records.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Communication Medical Record Review Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to permission by person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment for the exchange of information and review of their medical records.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: the exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.:A chronological written account of a patient's examination and treatment that includes the patient's medical history and complaints, the physician's physical findings, the results of diagnostic tests and procedures, and medications and therapeutic procedures. (dictionary.com):The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: The exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.

A chronological written account of a patient's examination and treatment that includes the patient's medical history and complaints, the physician's physical findings, the results of diagnostic tests and procedures, and medications and therapeutic procedures.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient consent to co
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to contact to review medical records to update personal and health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to contact to review her medical record and update her personal health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant agree that the researchers, or their representative, may review their medical records in the future?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Patient Consent Ind-3 2189909v1 with VD ID#3506034 - Yes No Unknown Indicator - dbw Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014
